name: Vitamin C
description: Water-soluble vitamin that protects against oxidative stress and supports immune function.

name: Vitamin E
description: Fat-soluble antioxidant that protects cell membranes from oxidative damage.

name: Beta-Carotene
description: Precursor to vitamin A; scavenges free radicals and supports vision.

name: Lycopene
description: Carotenoid that protects against oxidative damage and supports heart health.

name: Lutein
description: Carotenoid that supports eye health by filtering harmful light.

name: Zeaxanthin
description: Works with lutein to protect the eyes from oxidative stress.

name: Selenium
description: Trace mineral that supports antioxidant enzymes and immune function.

name: Flavonoids
description: Group of polyphenolic compounds with anti-inflammatory and antioxidant properties.

name: Anthocyanins
description: Pigments that provide antioxidant effects and support vascular health.

name: Resveratrol
description: Polyphenol that supports cardiovascular health and longevity.

name: Coenzyme Q10
source: Organ meats, fatty fish, whole grains
description: Antioxidant that supports energy production and reduces oxidative damage.

name: Glutathione
description: Endogenous antioxidant that protects cells from toxins and oxidative stress.

name: Curcumin
description: Active compound in turmeric with antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.

name: Catechins
description: Flavonoids that support cardiovascular health and reduce inflammation.

name: Quercetin
description: Flavonoid with anti-inflammatory and antioxidant effects.

name: Alpha-Lipoic Acid
description: Antioxidant that helps regenerate other antioxidants and supports energy metabolism.

name: Astaxanthin
description: Carotenoid with potent antioxidant properties, supporting skin and eye health.

name: Ellagic Acid
description: Polyphenol that may reduce oxidative stress and support cellular health.

name: Melatonin
description: Hormone with antioxidant properties that supports circadian rhythms and cellular protection.

name: Silymarin
description: Flavonoid complex that supports liver health and detoxification.
